law.catch_line: Workers' compensation for members on active state service.
law.text: The Department of Military Affairs shall accept the provisions of KRS Chapter 342 for the benefit of members of the Kentucky active militia while such members are on active state service.
law.history: Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 108, sec. 11. -- Created 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 2.
